src_original: yo hy andhakāre nabhasi prabhākaro vairocano … /

Wal_7 … / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ / saṁtvaramāṇo ’sau rāhuś candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭaḥ // Wal_8 tena samayena baḍir virocanapautra āsīd asuraḥ / adrākṣīd baḍir virocanapautro rāhuṇā asurendreṇa tvaritatvaritaṁ candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭam dṛṣṭvā ca tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe //
Wal_9 kiṁ nu saṁtvaramāṇas tvaṁ rāhuś candraṁ vimuñcasi / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ //
Wal_10 rāhur avocat // saptadhā me sphalen mūrdhā jīvan na sukham āpnuyāṁ tatra buddhābhigītena muñceyaṁ śaśinaṁ na cet // Wal_11 baḍir virocanapautra gāthayā babhāṣe //
Wal_5 loke sugatam arhantaṁ candramāḥ śaraṇaṁ gataḥ / rāhoś candramasaṁ muñca buddhā lokānukaṁpakāḥ //
